Package org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.ltl2buchi

Class ExtendedLTL2Buchi

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractControllableAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditableAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.AbstractTranslator<LTL,​FSA>
org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.ltl2buchi.LTL2Buchi
org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.ltl2buchi.ExtendedLTL2Buchi
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm, Translator<LTL,​FSA>
public class ExtendedLTL2Buchi
extends LTL2Buchi
This class provides an implementation of an extended LTL2Buchi translation algorithm. The extension allows translation of formulae containing past operators.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
LTL2Buchi

    FSA translate​(LTL formula)
    This method first simplifies the input formula (if the option is enabled), converts the formula to negation normal form, initializes the NTGBW, initializes the acceptance condition with acceptance sets put in LTL2Buchi.acc_map, and finally invoke LTL2Buchi.expand(LTL) to construct the NTGBW.

    • translate

      public FSA translate​(LTL formula) throws UnsupportedException
      Description copied from class: LTL2Buchi
      This method first simplifies the input formula (if the option is enabled), converts the formula to negation normal form, initializes the NTGBW, initializes the acceptance condition with acceptance sets put in LTL2Buchi.acc_map, and finally invoke LTL2Buchi.expand(LTL) to construct the NTGBW.
      Specified by:
      translate in interface Translator<LTL,​FSA>
      Overrides:
      translate in class LTL2Buchi
      Parameters:
      formula - a logic formula to be translate
      Returns:
      the automaton translated from formula
      Throws:
      UnsupportedException - if formula is not supported by this translator

    • expand

      protected void expand​(LTL formula)
      Description copied from class: LTL2Buchi
      Expands the formula to be translated. This method is responsible for the creation of all states and transitions of the NTGBW. The acceptance condition should also be filled in this method. Before this method is invoked, the NTGBW #aut is already initialized.
      Overrides:
      expand in class LTL2Buchi
      Parameters:
      formula - the formula to be translated

    • isEquivalent

      Returns:
      true if the two nodes are equivalent

    • SI

      protected boolean SI​(LTL f, LTLSet old, LTLSet next)
      Description copied from class: LTL2Buchi
      Returns true is a formula is syntactically implied by a set of formulae. The set of formulae is divided to two sets. One contains formulae to be satisfied in the current state. The other contains formulae to be satisfied in the successors.
      Overrides:
      SI in class LTL2Buchi
      Parameters:
      f - an LTL formula
      old - a set of formulae to be satisfied in the current state
      next - a set of formulae to be satisfied in the successors
      Returns:
      true is a formula is syntactically implied
